content: through remaining stitches and pull tight weave in remaining tail and trim leftover end you did it finishing soak hat in cool water with favourite wool wash squeeze out water making sure not to twist your project then roll hat up in a towel to remove excess water lay flat to dry when dry pop that hat on your head and show it off nicely done **another wonderful friend of mine beau shared with me her favourite way to block a hat her preference is to take a balloon and inflate it while it s inside the hat she lets the hat dry and then she pops the balloon leaving a perfect head-shaped hat thanks beau ** enjoy your hat
